meanings.definition: A region or administrative division in Russia and some other countries.
meanings.sent1: The oblasti in Russia have their own local governments.
meanings.sent2: She visited several oblasti during her trip to Eastern Europe.
meanings.sent3: The oblasti decided to have a friendly competition to see who could plant the most trees.
meanings.sent4: The diversity of cultures within the oblasti is like a colorful tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The vast expanse of the oblasti stretched out before them, showcasing its natural beauty.

meanings.sent1: There are many oblasti in Russia.
meanings.sent2: The map displayed all the oblasti in the country.
meanings.sent3: The oblasti gathered for a group photo, creating a sea of smiling faces.
meanings.sent4: The oblasti stood out like jewels in the crown of the nation.
meanings.sent5: The history of each oblasti is like a chapter in a grand book of unity.
